WizardAnswered on 25 Nov 2018Haha I'm actually going through this right now :) Also planning for a wedding banquet in 2020.Depends on what you are looking for presently? If you are looking for a miles card strategy, you should do something like this: Work backwards from the location of where you are going. (for 2 pax)Look at the miles cards in the market and which offers sign up bonuses and what the minimum spends on each to get the sign up bonus is neededUnderstand the validity of the miles on each card (how long before they expire and whether you can transfer it from the points to milesTalk to your hotel to stagger paymentTwo that we have our sights on are:CITI PremierMiles: https://seedly.sg/reviews/credit-cards/citi-premiermiles-milesAMEX Krisflyer: https://seedly.sg/reviews/credit-cards/american-express-krisflyer-milesYou can consider these two and read the reviews above also before making a decision :) Hope this helps.
